title: VEGAN MANGO-COCONUT GREEN SMOOTHIE
directions: Place all ingredients in a blender and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses, add toppings if desired, and serve with a straw.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh washed spinach leaves, packed (I generally use packaged, pre-washed baby spinach)
1 cup fresh or frozen mango cubes
3/4 cup light canned coconut milk (can substitute almond milk, but the end result might not be as creamy and wonâ€™t taste coconutty)
